title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python library for Ollama; chat, generate, embed via simple API client.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; works in Node or browsers via fetch.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package to use Ollama models as LLM/Chat/Embeddings endpoints.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat UI, model management, multi-user).

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive TUI for chatting with Ollama models from the terminal.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; sync/async APIs, model management, embeddings.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community-maintained Ruby gem for Ollama; chat, generate, pull models.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns Ollama into a local GitHub Copilot alternative.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in pipelines.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community recipes: FastAPI chatbot, Discord bot, Next.js app, GPU Docker stack, etc.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Official Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official container images (CPU & CUDA) for Ollama runtime.

title: ollama-models
summary: Community-curated Modelfile recipes for Llama-3, CodeLlama, Mistral, Phi-3, etc.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix package and NixOS module for Ollama with automatic GPU driver setup.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate for Ollama; strongly typed requests/responses, tokio/async support.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-hosted Discord bot that brings local LLM chat to any server using Ollama.

title: ollama-django
summary: Reusable Django app exposing Ollama as REST/chat endpoints with admin UI.

title: ollama-go
summary: Official Go client library for Ollama; generate, chat, pull, and delete models.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community .NET SDK for Ollama; supports chat, generate, embeddings, and model ops.
